#Definition of Acronyms



###Southern Edison Charge Ready Pilot Market Segments
MUD: Multi-Unit Dwelling
DC: Destination Center
WP: Workplace
Fleet: Fleet

###Price Context
TOU: Time of Use

P: Peak
OP: Off Peak
MP: Mid Peak
SOP: Super Off Peak


#Model Map

###This folder contains the following files:
-Time of Use (TOU) rate schedules
-A list of the number of chargers for all market segments
-Baseline average and total usage for all four SCE Charge Ready Pilot market segments 
-Baseline average and total *event* usage for all four SCE Charge Ready Pilot market segments
